definition: according to/in accordance with/to shine/to illuminate/to reflect/to look at (one's reflection)/to take (a photo)/photo/as requested/as before

sentences.english: The next day the hunter lured the quails with his quail call as usual.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，獵人照常利用叫聲來引誘鵪鶉。

sentences.english: As usual, the code will be released under an open source license.
sentences.chinese: 照常，代碼將遵循開放源碼許可證發佈。

sentences.english: The chairs are sheltered to ensure operation under the raining weather.
sentences.chinese: 纜車都設有遮雨棚，以確保在雨天照常運行。

sentences.english: That morning, he woke up early and sat in meditation as usual.
sentences.chinese: 一大早起來，還是一樣打坐，照常做修行的課程。

sentences.english: You are no longer to supply the people with straw for making bricks; let them go and gather their own straw.
sentences.chinese: 你們不可照常把草給百姓作磚，叫他們自己去撿草。

sentences.english: The churn revolved as usual, but the butter would not come.
sentences.chinese: 攪黃油的機器照常運轉着，但是黃油就是攪不出來。

sentences.english: Notwithstanding the bad weather, the match went on.
sentences.chinese: 儘管天氣很糟，比賽還是照常進行。

sentences.english: The profit for Apple -- as usual -- is in the high-margin hardware.
sentences.chinese: 照常，蘋果的利潤來自於高利潤的硬件。

sentences.english: You can now edit the files as usual.
sentences.chinese: 接下來您就可以照常編輯文件了。

sentences.english: You see, madrid goes about its business as usual .
sentences.chinese: 你瞧，馬德里照常進行工作。

sentences.english: As usual, Abraham hugged his wife when he returned home from work.
sentences.chinese: 阿伯拉漢下班回到家，照常先擁抱妻子。

sentences.english: They urged that the library be kept open during the vacation.
sentences.chinese: 他們極力主張在放假期間圖書館應當照常開放。

sentences.english: He's fine and is training as normal with the team this morning.
sentences.chinese: 他情況很好並且和隊友們在早晨照常進行了訓練。

sentences.english: He was prophesying in his house, while David was playing the harp, as he usually did. Saul had a spear in his hand
sentences.chinese: 大衛照常彈琴，掃羅手裏拿着槍。

sentences.english: 39Jesus went out as usual to the Mount of Olives, and his disciples followed him.
sentences.chinese: 耶穌出來，照常往橄欖山去，門徒也跟隨他。

sentences.english: As usual, Bill went to work by bus.
sentences.chinese: 比爾照常搭公交車去上班。

definition: in the evening/when night falls/towards evening/at night fall/at dusk
as before/(same) as usual/in the same manner/still/nevertheless
